document_data.title: Weapons
document_data.preceded_by: ''[[A Shot in the Dark, Part II]]''
document_data.Synopsis: Soon after Field General [[Charles Frederik LaVerne Blacktree IV]] led a settling expedition to the [[Underdark]] and established the settlement of [[Ravens Deep]] in [[The Great Passage]], a band of heroes was tasked with charting the nearby dangerous cavern known as [[The Passages of Man]] due their peculiar layout. The adventurers set into the dangerous terrain where they faced [[drow]] patrols, an ancient [[dwarven]] construct that held the spirit of [[Stonefist Gemsplitter]], established contact with a drow merchant from [[Menzoberranzan]] â€“ [[Talabrina Xorlarrin]], and found themselves in the middle of a small scale war between [[Zorinca]] of [[Juiblex]] and [[monstrous humanoids]] of the Underdark.
